UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Understanding interactions of Citropin 1.1 analogues with model membranes and their influence on biological activity.
Literature.Author: Rodrigues de Almeida N, Catazaro J, Krishnaiah M, Singh Chhonker Y, Murry DJ, Powers R, Conda-Sheridan M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>32 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=21.26 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus JE2(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>32µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=16µg/ml)
